New Records: The Knicks tied for the lowest three-pointers hit in a single NBA game this season
Key Match Events: The Knicks missed 15 three-pointers in a row
Cameron Payne hit a meaningless triple that created the final margin toward the end
Pre-Game Insights: The Knicks' lengthy homestand got off to an inauspicious start
The Knicks were 4-of-22 from three-point range
Post-Match Reflections: Josh Hart said they've got to make sure they're locked in on this team, sacrificing on this team, and go out there and play
Jalen Brunson said they've got to find a way to impact the game in other areas when they're not making shots
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks have hit only 31.6 percent of their triples from deep over the last nine games
The Knicks were one of six teams to have a.500 or better record when hitting 10 or fewer triples
Others: The Knicks welcome in the Toronto Raptors on Wednesday
